GV05gmandk_u:0: bahiḥprajño vibhuḥ viśvo hy antaḥprajñas tu taijasaḥ /
GV05gmandk_u:1: ghanaprajñaḥ tathā prājña eka eva tridhā smṛtaḥ // MandUpK_1.1 //
GV05gmandk_u:2: dakṣiṇākṣimukhe viśvo manasy antas tu taijasaḥ /
GV05gmandk_u:3: ākāśe ca hṛdi prājñas tridhā dehe vyavasthitaḥ // MandUpK_1.2 //
GV05gmandk_u:4: viśvaḥ hi sthūlabhuṅ nityaṃ taijasaḥ praviviktabhuk /
GV05gmandk_u:5: ānandabhuk tathā prājñastridhā bhogaṃ nibodhata // MandUpK_1.3 //
GV05gmandk_u:6: sthūlaṃ tarpayate viśvaṃ praviviktaṃ tu taijasam /
GV05gmandk_u:7: ānandaś ca tathā prājñaṃ tridhā tṛptiṃ nibodhata // MandUpK_1.4 //
GV05gmandk_u:8: triṣu dhāmasu yadbhojyaṃ bhoktā yaś ca prakīrtitaḥ /
GV05gmandk_u:9: vadaitadubhayaṃ yas tu sa bhuñjāno na lipyate // MandUpK_1.5 //
GV05gmandk_u:11: sarvaṃ janayati prāṇaś ceto 'ṃśūn puruṣaḥ pṛthak // MandUpK_1.6 //
GV05gmandk_u:12: vibhūtiṃ prasavaṃ tv anye manyante sṛṣṭicintakāḥ /
GV05gmandk_u:14: icchāmātraṃ prabhoḥ sṛṣṭir iti sṛṣṭau viniścitāḥ /
GV05gmandk_u:15: kālāt prasūtiṃ bhūtānāṃ manyante kālacintakāḥ // MandUpK_1.8 //
GV05gmandk_u:16: bhogārthaṃ sṛṣṭir iti anye krīḍārtham iti cāpare /
GV05gmandk_u:17: devasyaiṣa svabhāvo 'yam āptakāmasya kā spṛhā // MandUpK_1.9 //
GV05gmandk_u:19: advaitaḥ sarvabhāvānāṃ devās turyo vibhuḥ smṛtaḥ // MandUpK_1.10 //
GV05gmandk_u:21: prājñaḥ kāraṇabaddhas tu dvau tau turye na sidhyataḥ // MandUpK_1.11 //
GV05gmandk_u:22: nātmānaṃ na parāś caiva na satyaṃ na api cānṛtam /
GV05gmandk_u:23: prājñaḥ kiñcana saṃvetti turyaṃ tat sarvadṛk sadā // MandUpK_1.12 //
GV05gmandk_u:25: bījanidrāyutaḥ prājñaḥ sā ca turye na vidyate // MandUpK_1.13 //
GV05gmandk_u:27: na nidrāṃ naiva ca svapnaṃ turye paśyanti niścitaḥ // MandUpK_1.14 //
GV05gmandk_u:28: anyathā gṛhṇataḥ svapno nidrā tattvam ajānataḥ /
GV05gmandk_u:29: viparyāse tayoḥ kṣīṇe turīyaṃ padam aśnute // MandUpK_1.15 //
GV05gmandk_u:31: ajam anidram asvapnam advaitaṃ budhyate tadā // MandUpK_1.16 //
GV05gmandk_u:32: prapañco yadi vidyeta nivarteta na saṃśayaḥ /
GV05gmandk_u:33: māyāmātram idaṃ dvaitam advaitaṃ paramārthataḥ // MandUpK_1.17 //
GV05gmandk_u:35: upadeśād ayaṃ vādo jñāte dvaitaṃ na vidyate // MandUpK_1.18 //
GV05gmandk_u:37: mātrāsaṃpratipattau syād āptisāmānyam eva ca // MandUpK_1.19 //
GV05gmandk_u:39: mātrāsaṃpratipattau syād ubhayatvaṃ tathā vidham // MandUpK_1.20 //
GV05gmandk_u:41: mātrāsaṃpratipattau tu layasāmānyam eva ca // MandUpK_1.21 //
GV05gmandk_u:42: triṣu dhāmasu yat tulyaṃ sāmānyaṃ vetti niścitaḥ /
GV05gmandk_u:43: sa pūjyaḥ sarvabhūtānāṃ vandyaś caiva mahāmuniḥ // MandUpK_1.22 //
GV05gmandk_u:44: akāro nayate viśvam ukāraś cāpi taijasam /
GV05gmandk_u:45: makāraś ca punaḥ prājñaṃ nāmātre vidyate gatiḥ // MandUpK_1.23 //
GV05gmandk_u:46: oṃkāraṃ pādaśo vidyāt pādā mātrā na saṃśayaḥ /
GV05gmandk_u:47: oṃkāraṃ pādaśo jñātvā na kiñcid api cintayet // MandUpK_1.24 //
GV05gmandk_u:48: yuñjīta praṇave cetaḥ praṇavo brahma nirbhayam /
GV05gmandk_u:49: praṇave nityayuktasya na bhayaṃ vidyate kvacit // MandUpK_1.25 //
GV05gmandk_u:50: praṇavo hy aparaṃ brahma praṇavaś ca paraḥ smṛtaḥ /
GV05gmandk_u:52: sarvasya praṇavo hy ādir madhyam antas tathaiva ca /
GV05gmandk_u:53: evaṃ hi praṇavaṃ jñātvā vyaśnute tad anantaram // MandUpK_1.27 //
GV05gmandk_u:54: praṇavaṃ hīśvaraṃ vidyāt sarvasya hṛdi saṃsthitam /
GV05gmandk_u:55: sarvavyāpinam oṃkāraṃ matvā dhīro na śocati // MandUpK_1.28 //
GV05gmandk_u:57: oṃkāro vidito yena sa munir netāro janaḥ // MandUpK_1.29 //
GV05gmandk_u:60: antaḥsthānāt tu bhāvānāṃ saṃvṛtatvena hetunā // MandUpK_2.1 //
GV05gmandk_u:61: adīrghatvāc ca kālasya gatvā deśān na paśyati /
GV05gmandk_u:62: pratibuddhaś ca vai sarvas tasmin deśe na vidyate // MandUpK_2.2 //
GV05gmandk_u:64: vaitathyaṃ tena vai prāptaṃ svapna āhuḥ prakāśitam // MandUpK_2.3 //
GV05gmandk_u:65: antasthānāt tu bhedānāṃ tasmāj jāgarite smṛtam /
GV05gmandk_u:66: yathā tatra tathā svapne saṃvṛtatvena bhidyate // MandUpK_2.4 //
GV05gmandk_u:68: bhedānāṃ hi samatvena prasiddhenaiva hetunā // MandUpK_2.5 //
GV05gmandk_u:69: ādāvante ca yan nāsti vartamāne 'pi tat tathā /
GV05gmandk_u:70: vitathaiḥ sadṛśāḥ santo 'vitathā iva lakṣitāḥ // MandUpK_2.6 //
GV05gmandk_u:72: tasmād ādyantavatvena mithyaiva khalu te smṛtāḥ // MandUpK_2.7 //
GV05gmandk_u:74: tānayaṃ prekṣate gatvā yathaiveha suśikṣitaḥ // MandUpK_2.8 //
GV05gmandk_u:75: svapnavṛttāv api tv antaś cetasā kalpitaṃ tv asat /
GV05gmandk_u:76: bahiś cetogṛhītaṃ sad dṛṣṭaṃ vaitathyam etayoḥ // MandUpK_2.9 //
GV05gmandk_u:77: jāgradvṛttāvapi tv antaś cetasā kalpitaṃ tv asat /
GV05gmandk_u:78: bahiścetogṛhītaṃ sad yuktaṃ vaitathyam etayoḥ // MandUpK_2.10 //
GV05gmandk_u:79: ubhayor api vaitathyaṃ bhedānāṃ sthānayor yadi /
GV05gmandk_u:80: ka etān budhyate bhedān ko vai teṣāṃ vikalpakaḥ // MandUpK_2.11 //
GV05gmandk_u:82: sa eva budhyate bhedān iti vedāntaniścayaḥ // MandUpK_2.12 //
GV05gmandk_u:84: niyatāṃś ca bahiścitta evaṃ kalpayate prabhuḥ // MandUpK_2.13 //
GV05gmandk_u:85: cittakālā hi ye 'ntas tu dvayakālāś ca ye bahiḥ /
GV05gmandk_u:86: kalpitā eva te sarve viśeṣo nānyahetukaḥ // MandUpK_2.14 //
GV05gmandk_u:87: avyaktā eva ye 'ntas tu sphuṭā eva ca ye bahiḥ /
GV05gmandk_u:88: kalpitā eva te sarve viśeṣas tv indriyāntare // MandUpK_2.15 //
GV05gmandk_u:89: jīvaṃ kalpayate pūrvaṃ vaco bhāvān pṛthagvidhān /
GV05gmandk_u:90: bāhyān ādhyātmikāṃś caiva yathāvidyas tathāsmṛtiḥ // MandUpK_2.16 //
GV05gmandk_u:92: sarpadhārādibhir bhāvais tadvad ātmā vikalpitaḥ // MandUpK_2.17 //
GV05gmandk_u:94: rajjur eveti cādvaitaṃ tadvad ātmaviniścayaḥ // MandUpK_2.18 //
GV05gmandk_u:95: prāṇādibhir anantaiś ca bhāvair etair vikalpitaḥ /
GV05gmandk_u:96: māyaiṣā tasya devasya yayā saṃmohitaḥ svayam // MandUpK_2.19 //
GV05gmandk_u:97: prāṇa iti prāṇavido bhūtānīti ca tadvidaḥ /
GV05gmandk_u:98: guṇā iti guṇavidas tattvānīti ca tadvidaḥ // MandUpK_2.20 //
GV05gmandk_u:99: pādā iti pādavido viṣayā iti ca tadvidaḥ /
GV05gmandk_u:100: lokā iti lokavido devā iti ca tadvidaḥ // MandUpK_2.21 //
GV05gmandk_u:101: vedā iti vedavido yajñā iti ca tadvidaḥ /
GV05gmandk_u:102: bhokteti ca bhoktṛvido bhojyam iti ca tadvidaḥ // MandUpK_2. 22 //
GV05gmandk_u:103: sūkṣma iti sūkṣmavidaḥ sthūla iti ca tadvidaḥ /
GV05gmandk_u:104: mūrta iti mūrtavido 'mūrta iti ca tadvidaḥ // MandUpK_2.23 //
GV05gmandk_u:105: kāla iti kālavido diśa iti ca tadvidaḥ /
GV05gmandk_u:106: vādā iti vādavido bhuvanānīti tadvidaḥ // MandUpK_2.24 //
GV05gmandk_u:107: mana iti manovido buddhir iti ca tadvidaḥ /
GV05gmandk_u:108: cittam iti cittavido dharmādharmau ca tadvidaḥ // MandUpK_2.25 //
GV05gmandk_u:109: pañcaviṃśaka ity eke ṣaḍviśa iti cāpare /
GV05gmandk_u:110: ekatriṃśaka ity āhur ananta iti cāpare // MandUpK_2.26 //
GV05gmandk_u:111: lokāṃl lokavidaḥ prāhur āśramā iti tadvidaḥ /
GV05gmandk_u:113: sṛṣṭir iti sṛṣṭivido laya iti ca tadvidaḥ /
GV05gmandk_u:114: sthitir iti sthitividaḥ sarve ceha tu sarvadā // MandUpK_2.28 //
GV05gmandk_u:115: yaṃ bhāvaṃ darśayed yasya taṃ bhāvaṃ sa tu paśyati /
GV05gmandk_u:116: taṃ cāvati sa bhūtvāsau tadgrahaḥ samupaiti tam // MandUpK_2.29 //
GV05gmandk_u:118: evaṃ yo veda tattvena kalpayet so 'viśaṅkitaḥ // MandUpK_2.30 //
GV05gmandk_u:120: tathā viśvam idaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ vedānteṣu vicakṣaṇaiḥ // MandUpK_2.31 //
GV05gmandk_u:121: na nirodho na cotpattir na baddho na ca sādhakaḥ /
GV05gmandk_u:122: na mumukṣur na vai mukta ity eṣā paramārthatā // MandUpK_2.32 //
GV05gmandk_u:123: bhāvair asadbhir evāyam advayena ca kalpitaḥ /
GV05gmandk_u:124: bhāvā apy advayenaiva tasmād advayatā śivā // MandUpK_2.33 //
GV05gmandk_u:126: na pṛthaṅ nāpṛthak kiñcid iti tattvavido viduḥ // MandUpK_2.34 //
GV05gmandk_u:128: nirvikalpo hy ayaṃ dṛṣṭaḥ prapañcopaśamo 'dvayaḥ // MandUpK_2.35 //
GV05gmandk_u:129: tasmād evaṃ viditvainam advaite yojayet smṛtim /
GV05gmandk_u:132: calācalaniketaś ca yatir yādṛcchiko bhavet // MandUpK_2.37 //
GV05gmandk_u:133: tattvam ādhyātmikaṃ dṛṣṭvā tattvaṃ dṛṣṭvā tu bāhyataḥ /
GV05gmandk_u:134: tattvībhūtas tadārāmas tattvād apracyuto bhavet // MandUpK_2.38 //
GV05gmandk_u:137: prāgutpatter ajaṃ sarvaṃ tenāsau kṛpaṇaḥ smṛtaḥ // MandUpK_3.1 //
GV05gmandk_u:138: ato vakṣyāmy akārpaṇyam ajāti samatāṃ gatam /
GV05gmandk_u:139: yathā na jāyate kiñcij jāyamānaṃ samantataḥ // MandUpK_3.2 //
GV05gmandk_u:141: ghaṭādivac ca saṃghātair jātāv etan nidarśanam // MandUpK_3.3 //
GV05gmandk_u:143: ākāśe saṃpralīyante tadvaj jīvā ihātmani // MandUpK_3.4 //
GV05gmandk_u:145: na sarve saṃprayujyante tadvaj jīvāḥ sukhādibhiḥ // MandUpK_3.5 //
GV05gmandk_u:146: rūpakāryasamākhyāś ca bhidyante tatra tatra vai /
GV05gmandk_u:147: ākāśasya na bhedo 'sti tadvaj jīveṣu nirṇayaḥ // MandUpK_3.6 //
GV05gmandk_u:149: naivātmanaḥ sadā jīvo vikārāvayavau tathā // MandUpK_3.7 //
GV05gmandk_u:150: yathā bhavati bālānāṃ gaganaṃ malinaṃ malaiḥ /
GV05gmandk_u:151: tathā bhavaty abuddhānām ātmāpi malino malaiḥ // MandUpK_3.8 //
GV05gmandk_u:155: ādhikye sarvasāmye vā nopapattir hi vidyate // MandUpK_3.10 //
GV05gmandk_u:156: rasādayo hi ye kośā vyākhyātās taittirīyake /
GV05gmandk_u:157: teṣām ātmā paro jīvaḥ khaṃ yathā saṃprakāśitaḥ // MandUpK_3.11 //
GV05gmandk_u:158: dvayor dvayor madhujñāne paraṃ brahma prakāśitam /
GV05gmandk_u:161: nānātvaṃ nindyate yac ca tad evaṃ hi samañjasam // MandUpK_3.13 //
GV05gmandk_u:163: bhaviṣyadvṛtyā gauṇaṃ tan mukhyatvaṃ hi na yujyate // MandUpK_3.14 //
GV05gmandk_u:165: upāyaḥ so 'vatārāya nāsti bhedaḥ kathañcana // MandUpK_3.15 //
GV05gmandk_u:169: parasparaṃ virudhyante tairayaṃ na virudhyate // MandUpK_3.17 //
GV05gmandk_u:170: advaitaṃ paramārtho hi dvaitaṃ tadbheda ucyate /
GV05gmandk_u:171: teṣām ubhayathā dvaitaṃ tenāyaṃ na viruddhyate // MandUpK_3.18 //
GV05gmandk_u:172: māyayā bhidyate hy etan nānyathājaṃ kathañcana /
GV05gmandk_u:173: tattvato bhidyamāne hi martyatām amṛtaṃ vrajet // MandUpK_3.19 //
GV05gmandk_u:175: ajāto hy amṛto bhāvo martyatāṃ katham eṣyati // MandUpK_3.20 //
GV05gmandk_u:176: na bhavaty amṛtaṃ martyaṃ na martyam amṛtaṃ tathā /
GV05gmandk_u:177: prakṛter anyathābhāvo na kathañcid bhaviṣyati // MandUpK_3.21 //
GV05gmandk_u:179: kṛtakenāmṛtas tasya kathaṃ sthāsyati niścalaḥ // MandUpK_3.22 //
GV05gmandk_u:181: niścitaṃ yuktiyuktaṃ ca yat tad bhavati netarat // MandUpK_3.23 //
GV05gmandk_u:182: neha nāneti cāmnāyād indro māyābhir ity api /
GV05gmandk_u:183: ajāyamāno bahudhā māyayā jāyate tu saḥ // MandUpK_3.24 //
GV05gmandk_u:185: ko nv enaṃ janayed iti kāraṇaṃ pratiṣidhyate // MandUpK_3.25 //
GV05gmandk_u:186: sa eṣa neti netīti vyākhyātaṃ nihnute yataḥ /
GV05gmandk_u:188: sato hi māyayā janma yujyate na tu tattvataḥ /
GV05gmandk_u:189: tattvato jāyate yasya jātaṃ tasya hi jāyate // MandUpK_3.27 //
GV05gmandk_u:190: asato māyayā janma tattvato naiva yujyate /
GV05gmandk_u:191: vandhyāputro na tattvena māyayā vāpi jāyate // MandUpK_3.28 //
GV05gmandk_u:192: yathā svapne dvayābhāsaṃ spandate māyayā manaḥ /
GV05gmandk_u:193: tathā jāgraddvayābhāsaṃ spandate māyayā manaḥ // MandUpK_3.29 //
GV05gmandk_u:194: advayaṃ ca dvayābhāsaṃ manaḥ svapne na saṃśayaḥ /
GV05gmandk_u:195: advayaṃ ca dvayābhāsaṃ tathā jāgran na saṃśayaḥ // MandUpK_3.30 //
GV05gmandk_u:196: manodṛśyam idaṃ dvaitaṃ yat kiñcit sacarācaram /
GV05gmandk_u:197: manaso hy amanībhāve dvaitaṃ naivopalabhyate // MandUpK_3.31 //
GV05gmandk_u:199: amanastāṃ tadā yāti grāhyābhāve tadagraham // MandUpK_3.32 //
GV05gmandk_u:201: brahma jñeyam ajaṃ nityam ajenājaṃ vibudhyate // MandUpK_3.33 //
GV05gmandk_u:203: pracāraḥ sa tu vijñeyaḥ suṣupte 'nyo na tatsamaḥ // MandUpK_3.34 //
GV05gmandk_u:204: līyate hi suṣupte tan nigṛhītaṃ na līyate /
GV05gmandk_u:205: tad eva nirbhayaṃ brahma jñānalokaṃ samantataḥ // MandUpK_3.35 //
GV05gmandk_u:210: graho na tatra notsargaś cintā yatra na vidyate /
GV05gmandk_u:211: ātmasaṃsthaṃ tadā jñānam ajāti samatāṃ gatam // MandUpK_3.38 //
GV05gmandk_u:213: yogino bibhyati hy asmād abhaye bhayadarśinaḥ // MandUpK_3.39 //
GV05gmandk_u:215: duḥkhakṣayaḥ prabodhaś cāpy akṣayā śāntir eva ca // MandUpK_3.40 //
GV05gmandk_u:217: manaso nigrahas tadvad bhaved aparikhedataḥ // MandUpK_3.41 //
GV05gmandk_u:219: suprasannaṃ laye caiva yathā kāmo layas tathā // MandUpK_3.42 //
GV05gmandk_u:221: ajaṃ sarvamanusmṛtya jātaṃ naiva tu paśyati // MandUpK_3.43 //
GV05gmandk_u:222: laye saṃbodhayec cittaṃ vikṣiptaṃ śamayet punaḥ /
GV05gmandk_u:223: sakaṣāyaṃ vijānīyāt samaprāptaṃ na cālayet // MandUpK_3.44 //
GV05gmandk_u:224: nāsvādayet sukhaṃ tatra niḥsaṅgaḥ prajñayā bhavet /
GV05gmandk_u:225: niścalaṃ niścarac cittam ekīkuryāt prayatnataḥ // MandUpK_3.45 //
GV05gmandk_u:226: yadā na līyate cittaṃ na ca vikṣipyate punaḥ /
GV05gmandk_u:227: aniṅganam anābhāsaṃ niṣpannaṃ brahma tat tadā // MandUpK_3.46 //
GV05gmandk_u:228: svasthaṃ śāntaṃ sanirvāṇam akathyaṃ sukham uttamam /
GV05gmandk_u:229: ajam ajena jñeyena sarvajñaṃ paricakṣate // MandUpK_3.47 //
GV05gmandk_u:230: na kaścij jāyate jīvaḥ saṃbhavo 'sya na vidyate /
GV05gmandk_u:231: etat tad uttamaṃ satyaṃ yatra kiñcin na jāyate // MandUpK_3.48 //
GV05gmandk_u:234: jñeyābhinnena saṃbuddhas taṃ vande dvipadāṃ varam // MandUpK_4.1 //
GV05gmandk_u:236: avivādo 'viruddhaś ca deśitas taṃ namāmy aham // MandUpK_4.2 //
GV05gmandk_u:237: bhūtasya jātim icchanti vādinaḥ kecid eva hi /
GV05gmandk_u:239: bhūtaṃ na jāyate kiñcid abhūtaṃ naiva jāyate /
GV05gmandk_u:240: vivadanto 'dvayā hy evam ajātiṃ khyāpayanti te // MandUpK_4.4 //
GV05gmandk_u:242: vivadāmo na taiḥ sārdham avivādaṃ nibodhata // MandUpK_4.5 //
GV05gmandk_u:244: ajāto hy amṛto dharmo martyatāṃ katham eṣyati // MandUpK_4.6 //
GV05gmandk_u:245: na bhavaty amṛtaṃ martyaṃ na martyam amṛtaṃ tathā /
GV05gmandk_u:246: prakṛter anyathābhāvo na kathañcid bhaviṣyati // MandUpK_4.7 //
GV05gmandk_u:248: kṛtakenāmṛtas tasya kathaṃ sthāsyati niścalaḥ // MandUpK_4.8 //
GV05gmandk_u:249: sāṃsiddhikī svābhāvikī sahajā akṛtā ca yā /
GV05gmandk_u:250: prakṛtiḥ seti vijñeyā svabhāvaṃ na jahāti yā // MandUpK_4.9 //
GV05gmandk_u:253: kāraṇaṃ yasya vai kāryaṃ kāraṇaṃ tasya jāyate /
GV05gmandk_u:254: jāyamānaṃ katham ajaṃ bhinnaṃ nityaṃ kathaṃ ca tat // MandUpK_4.11 //
GV05gmandk_u:255: kāraṇād yady ananyatvam ataḥ kāryam ajaṃ yadi /
GV05gmandk_u:256: jāyamānād dhi vai kāryāt kāraṇaṃ te kathaṃ dhruvam // MandUpK_4.12 //
GV05gmandk_u:257: ajād vai jāyate yasya dṛṣṭāntas tasya nāsti vai /
GV05gmandk_u:258: jātāc ca jāyāmānasya na vyavasthā prasajyate // MandUpK_4.13 //
GV05gmandk_u:259: hetor ādiḥ phalaṃ yeṣām ādir hetuḥ phalasya ca /
GV05gmandk_u:260: hetoḥ phalasya cānādiḥ kathaṃ tair upavarṇyate // MandUpK_4.14 //
GV05gmandk_u:261: hetor ādiḥ phalaṃ yeṣām ādir hetuḥ kalasya ca /
GV05gmandk_u:262: tathā janma bhavet teṣāṃ putrāj janma pitur yathā // MandUpK_4.15 //
GV05gmandk_u:265: phalād utpadyamānaḥ san na te hetuḥ prasidhyati /
GV05gmandk_u:266: aprasiddhaḥ kathaṃ hetuḥ phalam utpādayiṣyati // MandUpK_4.17 //
GV05gmandk_u:267: yadi hetoḥ phalāt siddhiḥ phalasiddhiś ca hetutaḥ /
GV05gmandk_u:268: katarat pūrvaniṣpannaṃ yasya siddhir apekṣayā // MandUpK_4.18 //
GV05gmandk_u:270: evaṃ hi sarvathā buddhair ajātiḥ paridīpitā // MandUpK_4.19 //
GV05gmandk_u:271: bījāṅkurākhyo dṛṣṭāntaḥ sadā sādhyasamo hi sa /
GV05gmandk_u:272: na hi sādhyasamo hetuḥ siddhau sādhyasya yujyate // MandUpK_4.20 //
GV05gmandk_u:274: jāyamānād dhi vai dharmāt kathaṃ pūrvaṃ na gṛhyate // MandUpK_4.21 //
GV05gmandk_u:275: svato vā parato vāpi na kiñcid vastu jāyate /
GV05gmandk_u:276: sad asat sadasad vāpi na kiñcid vastu jāyate // MandUpK_4.22 //
GV05gmandk_u:277: hetur na jāyate 'nādeḥ phalaṃ cāpi svabhāvataḥ /
GV05gmandk_u:278: ādir na vidyate yasya tasya hy ādir na vidyate // MandUpK_4.23 //
GV05gmandk_u:283: cittaṃ na saṃspṛśaty arthaṃ nārthābhāsaṃ tathaiva ca /
GV05gmandk_u:284: abhūto hi yataś cārtho nārthābhāsas tataḥ pṛthak // MandUpK_4.26 //
GV05gmandk_u:285: nimittaṃ na sadā cittaṃ saṃspṛśaty adhvasu triṣu /
GV05gmandk_u:286: animitto viparyāsaḥ kathaṃ tasya bhaviṣyati // MandUpK_4.27 //
GV05gmandk_u:287: tasmān na jāyate cittaṃ cittadṛśyaṃ na jāyate /
GV05gmandk_u:288: tasya paśyanti ye jātiṃ khe vai paśyanti te padam // MandUpK_4.28 //
GV05gmandk_u:289: ajātaṃ jāyate yasmād ajātiḥ prakṛtis tataḥ /
GV05gmandk_u:290: prakṛter anyathābhāvo na kathañcid bhaviṣyati // MandUpK_4.29 //
GV05gmandk_u:291: anāder antavattvaṃ ca saṃsārasya na setsyati /
GV05gmandk_u:292: anantatā cādimato mokṣasya na bhaviṣyati // MandUpK_4.30 //
GV05gmandk_u:293: ādāvante ca yan nāsti vartamāne 'pi tat tathā /
GV05gmandk_u:294: vitathaiḥ sadṛśāḥ santo 'vitathā iva lakṣitāḥ // MandUpK_4.31 //
GV05gmandk_u:296: tasmād ādyantavattvena mithyaiva khalu te smṛtāḥ // MandUpK_4.32 //
GV05gmandk_u:298: saṃvṛtte 'smin pradeśe vai bhūtānāṃ darśanaṃ kutaḥ // MandUpK_4.33 //
GV05gmandk_u:299: na yuktaṃ darśanaṃ gatvā kālasyāniyamād gatau /
GV05gmandk_u:300: pratibuddhaś ca vai sarvas tasmin deśe na vidyate // MandUpK_4.34 //
GV05gmandk_u:301: mitrādyaiḥ saha saṃmantrya saṃbuddhau na prapadyate /
GV05gmandk_u:302: gṛhītaṃ cāpi yat kiñcit pratibuddho na paśyati // MandUpK_4.35 //
GV05gmandk_u:303: svapne cāvastukaḥ kāyaḥ pṛthag anyasya darśanāt /
GV05gmandk_u:304: yathā kāyas tathā sarvaṃ cittadṛśyam avastukam // MandUpK_4.36 //
GV05gmandk_u:306: tad dhetutvāt tu tasyaiva sajjāgaritam iṣyate // MandUpK_4.37 //
GV05gmandk_u:308: na ca bhūtād abhūtasya saṃbhavo 'sti kathañcana // MandUpK_4.38 //
GV05gmandk_u:309: asaj jāgarite dṛṣṭvā svapne paśyati tanmayaḥ /
GV05gmandk_u:310: asatsvapne 'pi dṛṣṭvā ca pratibuddhau na paśyati // MandUpK_4.39 //
GV05gmandk_u:312: sac ca saddhetukaṃ nāsti saddhetukam asat kutaḥ // MandUpK_4.40 //
GV05gmandk_u:313: viparyāsād yathā jāgrad acintyān bhūtavat spṛśet /
GV05gmandk_u:314: tathā svapne viparyāsād dharmāṃs tatraiva paśyati // MandUpK_4.41 //
GV05gmandk_u:316: jātis tu deśitā buddhair ajātes trasatāṃ sadā // MandUpK_4.42 //
GV05gmandk_u:317: ajātes trasatāṃ teṣām upalambhād viyanti ye /
GV05gmandk_u:318: jātidoṣā na setsyanti doṣo 'py alpo bhaviṣyati // MandUpK_4.43 //
GV05gmandk_u:320: upalambhāt samācārād asti vastu tathocyate // MandUpK_4.44 //
GV05gmandk_u:322: ajācalam avastutvaṃ vijñānaṃ śāntam advayam // MandUpK_4.45 //
GV05gmandk_u:323: evaṃ na jāyate cittam evaṃ dharmā ajāḥ smṛtāḥ /
GV05gmandk_u:324: evam eva vijānanto na patanti viparyaye // MandUpK_4.46 //
GV05gmandk_u:328: aspandamānaṃ vijñānam anābhāsam ajaṃ tathā // MandUpK_4.48 //
GV05gmandk_u:329: alāte spandamāne vai nābhāsā anyato bhuvaḥ /
GV05gmandk_u:330: na tato 'nyatra nispandān nālātaṃ praviśanti te // MandUpK_4.49 //
GV05gmandk_u:334: na tato 'nyatra nispandān na vijñānaṃ viśanti te // MandUpK_4.51 //
GV05gmandk_u:337: dravyaṃ dravyasya hetuḥ syād anyad anyasya caiva hi /
GV05gmandk_u:338: dravyatvam anyabhāvo vā dharmāṇāṃ nopapadyate // MandUpK_4.53 //
GV05gmandk_u:339: evaṃ na cittajā dharmāś cittaṃ vāpi na dharmajam /
GV05gmandk_u:344: kṣīṇe hetuphalāveśe saṃsāraṃ na prapadyate // MandUpK_4.56 //
GV05gmandk_u:345: saṃvṛtyā jāyate sarvaṃ śāśvataṃ nāsti tena vai /
GV05gmandk_u:346: sadbhāvena hy ajaṃ sarvam ucchedas tena nāsti vai // MandUpK_4.57 //
GV05gmandk_u:347: dharmā ya iti jāyante jāyante te na tattvataḥ /
GV05gmandk_u:348: janma māyopamaṃ teṣāṃ sā ca māyā na vidyate // MandUpK_4.58 //
GV05gmandk_u:350: nāsau nityo na cocchedī tadvad dharmeṣu yojanā // MandUpK_4.59 //
GV05gmandk_u:352: yatra varṇā na vartante vivekas tatra nocyate // MandUpK_4.60 //
GV05gmandk_u:353: yathā svapne dvayābhāsaṃ cittaṃ calati māyayā /
GV05gmandk_u:354: tathā jāgrad dvayābhāsaṃ cittaṃ calati māyayā // MandUpK_4.61 //
GV05gmandk_u:355: advayaṃ ca dvayābhāsaṃ cittaṃ svapne na saṃśayaḥ /
GV05gmandk_u:356: advayaṃ ca dvayābhāsaṃ tathā jāgran na saṃśayaḥ // MandUpK_4.62 //
GV05gmandk_u:357: svapnadṛk pracaran svapne dikṣu vai daśasu sthitān /
GV05gmandk_u:358: aṇḍajān svedajān vāpi jīvān paśyati yān sadā // MandUpK_4.63 //
GV05gmandk_u:359: svapnadṛkcittadṛśyās te na vidyante tataḥ pṛthak /
GV05gmandk_u:360: tathā tad dṛśyam evedaṃ svapnadṛkcittam iṣyate // MandUpK_4.64 //
GV05gmandk_u:361: carañ jāgarite jāgrad dikṣu vai daśasu sthitān /
GV05gmandk_u:362: aṇḍajān svedajān vāpi jīvān paśyati yān sadā // MandUpK_4.65 //
GV05gmandk_u:363: jāgrac cittekṣaṇīyās te na vidyante tataḥ pṛthak /
GV05gmandk_u:364: tathā tad dṛśyam evedaṃ jāgrataś cittam iṣyate // MandUpK_4.66 //
GV05gmandk_u:365: ubhe hy anyonyadṛśye te kiṃ tad astīti cocyate /
GV05gmandk_u:366: lakṣaṇāśūnyam ubhayaṃ tan mate naiva gṛhyate // MandUpK_4.67 //
GV05gmandk_u:367: yathā svapnamayo jīvo jāyate mriyate 'pi ca /
GV05gmandk_u:368: tathā jīvā amī sarve bhavanti na bhavanti ca // MandUpK_4.68 //
GV05gmandk_u:369: yathā māyāmayo jīvo jāyate mriyate 'pi ca /
GV05gmandk_u:370: tathā jīvā amī sarve bhavanti na bhavanti ca // MandUpK_4.69 //
GV05gmandk_u:371: yathā nirmitako jīvo jāyate mriyate 'pi ca /
GV05gmandk_u:372: tathā jīvā amī sarve bhavanti na bhavanti ca // MandUpK_4.70 //
GV05gmandk_u:373: na kaścij jāyate jīvaḥ saṃbhavo 'sya na vidyate /
GV05gmandk_u:374: etat tad uttamaṃ satyaṃ yatra kiñcin na jāyate // MandUpK_4.71 //
GV05gmandk_u:376: cittaṃ nirviṣayaṃ nityam asaṅgaṃ tena kīrtitam // MandUpK_4.72 //
GV05gmandk_u:380: paratantrādiniṣpattyā saṃvṛtyā jāyate tu saḥ // MandUpK_4.74 //
GV05gmandk_u:382: dvayābhāvaṃ sa buddhvaiva nirnimitto na jāyate // MandUpK_4.75 //
GV05gmandk_u:384: tadā na jāyate cittaṃ hetvabhāve phalaṃ kutaḥ // MandUpK_4.76 //
GV05gmandk_u:386: ajātasyaiva sarvasya cittadṛśyaṃ hi tadyataḥ // MandUpK_4.77 //
GV05gmandk_u:387: buddhvā nimittatāṃ satyāṃ hetuṃ pṛthag anāpnuvan /
GV05gmandk_u:388: vītaśokaṃ tathākāmam abhayaṃ padam aśnute // MandUpK_4.78 //
GV05gmandk_u:390: vastvabhāvaṃ sa budhvaiva niḥsaṅgaṃ vinivartate // MandUpK_4.79 //
GV05gmandk_u:392: viṣayaḥ sa hi buddhānāṃ tat sāmyam ajam advayam // MandUpK_4.80 //
GV05gmandk_u:393: ajam anidram asvapnaṃ prabhātaṃ bhavati svayam /
GV05gmandk_u:394: sakṛdvibhāto hy evaiṣa dharma dhātusvabhāvataḥ // MandUpK_4.81 //
GV05gmandk_u:395: sukham āvriyate nityaṃ duḥkhaṃ vivriyate sadā /
GV05gmandk_u:396: yasya kasya ca dharmasya graheṇa bhagavān asau // MandUpK_4.82 //
GV05gmandk_u:397: asti nāsty asti nāstīti nāsti nāstīti vā punaḥ /
GV05gmandk_u:399: koṭhyaś catasra etās tu grahair yāsāṃ sadā vṛtaḥ /
GV05gmandk_u:400: bhagavān ābhir aspṛṣṭo yena dṛṣṭaḥ sa sarvadṛk // MandUpK_4.84 //
GV05gmandk_u:401: prāpya sarvajñatāṃ kṛtsnāṃ brāhmaṇyaṃ padam advayam /
GV05gmandk_u:402: anāpannādimadhyāntaṃ kim ataḥ param īhate // MandUpK_4.85 //
GV05gmandk_u:403: viprāṇāṃ vinayo hy eṣa śamaḥ prākṛta ucyate /
GV05gmandk_u:404: damaḥ prakṛtidāntatvād evaṃ vidvāñ śamaṃ vrajet // MandUpK_4.86 //
GV05gmandk_u:405: savastu sopalambhaṃ ca dvayaṃ laukikam iṣyate /
GV05gmandk_u:406: avastu sopalambhaṃ ca śuddhaṃ laukikam iṣyate // MandUpK_4.87 //
GV05gmandk_u:407: avastv anupalambhaṃ ca lokottaram iti smṛtam /
GV05gmandk_u:408: jñānaṃ jñeyaṃ ca vijñeyaṃ sadā buddhaiḥ prakīrtitam // MandUpK_4.88 //
GV05gmandk_u:409: jñāne ca trividhe jñeye krameṇa vidite svayam /
GV05gmandk_u:410: sarvajñatā hi sarvatra bhavatīha mahādhiyaḥ // MandUpK_4.89 //
GV05gmandk_u:412: teṣām anyatra vijñeyād upalambhas triṣu smṛtaḥ // MandUpK_4.90 //
GV05gmandk_u:414: vidyate na hi nānātvaṃ teṣāṃ kvacana kiñcanaḥ // MandUpK_4.91 //
GV05gmandk_u:416: yasyaivaṃ bhavati kṣāntiḥ so 'mṛtatvāya kalpate // MandUpK_4.92 //
GV05gmandk_u:418: sarve dharmāḥ samābhinnā ajaṃ sāmyaṃ viśāradam // MandUpK_4.93 //
GV05gmandk_u:419: vaiśāradyaṃ tu vai nāsti bhede vicaratāṃ sadā /
GV05gmandk_u:420: bhedanimnāḥ pṛthagvādās tasmāt te kṛpaṇāḥ smṛtāḥ // MandUpK_4.94 //
GV05gmandk_u:421: aje sāmye tu ye kecid bhaviṣyanti suniścitāḥ /
GV05gmandk_u:422: te hi loke mahājñānās tac ca loko na gāhate // MandUpK_4.95 //
GV05gmandk_u:423: ajeṣv ajam asaṃkrāntaṃ dharmeṣu jñānam iṣyate /
GV05gmandk_u:424: yato na kramate jñānam asaṅgaṃ tena kīrtitam // MandUpK_4.96 //
GV05gmandk_u:428: ādau buddhās tathā muktā budhyanta iti nāyakāḥ // MandUpK_4.98 //
GV05gmandk_u:429: kramate na hi buddhasya jñānaṃ dharmeṣu tāyinaḥ /
GV05gmandk_u:430: sarve dharmās tathā jñānaṃ naitad buddhena bhāṣitam // MandUpK_4.99 //
GV05gmandk_u:432: buddhvā padam anānātvaṃ namaskurmo yathābalam // MandUpK_4.100 //
